Title: Series: The Life of the Virgin
Description: The flight into Egypt; at centre, the Virgin seen holding the infant Christ and riding a donkey lead by St Joseph; two angels accompaning the family; the dove of the Holy Spirit seen above. Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (801.II) (Wierix)
Mauquoy-Hendrickx 1979 / Les Estampes des Wierix ... catalogue raisonné (627)
Alvin 1866 / Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre des trois frères Jan, Jérome et Antoine Wierix (424)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
